title.narrative: Renovation and operation of 3 schools in the Mogadishu and Hiran region of the Federal Republic of Somalia (Abu Bakr Othman School, Sheikh Ali Jamali School and Caspary School)

description.narrative: Providing appropriate educational environments and equipping them with basic school needs in communities in need, and improving the quality of the educational process in educational institutions through the restoration and operation of public education schools in order to fulfill their educational mission to the fullest, and building the capacities of educational and administrative cadres to ensure the continuation and continuation of education for school-age children. .
Restoration, operation and capacity building of educational and administrative cadres in 3 educational schools in Somalia for a period of (16) months
